paper_abstract: We classify the homogeneous polynomials in three variables whose toric polar linear system defines a Cremona transformation. This classification includes, as a proper subset, the classification of toric surface patches from geometric modeling which have linear precision. Besides the well-known tensor product patches and B,zier triangles, we identify a family of toric patches with trapezoidal shape, each of which has linear precision. Furthermore, B,zier triangles and tensor product patches are special cases of trapezoidal patches.
paper_title: Linear Precision for Toric Surface Patches
